nodes.title: Open Observability platform
nodes.summary: The leading open source project for visualizing metrics

product.summary: A leading centralized log management solution
The leading open source project for visualizing metrics
一个开源的端到端日志检索分析解决方案

overview.overview: A leading open source project for visualizing metrics. Supporting rich integration for every popular database.

highlights: Supports Mixing dozens of databases natively together in the same Dashboard.
Feature rich metrics dashboard and graph editor

childMarkdownRemark.html: This is a repackaged Grafana® with professional support for your business. Grafana® is an open source, feature rich metrics dashboard and graph editor for Graphite, Elasticsearch, OpenTSDB and InfluxDB. Grafana® has a plethora of visualization options to help you understand your data. Supports Mixing dozens of databases natively together in the same Dashboard.

faq.value: Graphite, InfluxDB, OpenTSDB, Prometheus, Elasticsearch, CloudWatch, KairosDB。
